item.title: Kimberly-Clark buying Tylenol maker Kenvue in $48.7 billion deal
item.description: Kimberly-Clark is buying Tylenol maker Kenvue in an approximately $48.7 billion cash-and-stock deal, creating a massive consumer health goods company

item.title: NATO member Romania signs agreement with Germany’s Rheinmetall to build a gunpowder plant
item.description: NATO member Romania has signed an agreement with Germany’s defense company Rheinmetall to build a gunpowder factory in central Romania, as Europe race...

item.title: France threatens to block Shein over sale of childlike sex dolls ahead of Paris store opening
item.description: French authorities are threatening to ban access to Shein after discovering the e-commerce site sold childlike sex dolls
